Package Model

Class SalaryCard

java.lang.Object
Model.Card
Model.PlayerCard
Model.SalaryCard
public class SalaryCard
extends PlayerCard
SalaryCard is the class that contains the needed attributes and methods to implement the behavior of a salary card in the Thats Life! game. SalaryCard is a child class of PlayerCard
See Also:
Card, PlayerCard

  • Constructor Details

    • SalaryCard

      public SalaryCard()
      The sole constructor for this class. Creates a salary card with a default name ("Your Salary Card") to be assigned to its super class.
